item.description:
A final agenda will be sent out on Sunday, the day before the meeting.

So far, we are going to have a PluralSight online training demo (with an offer for 1 month of free, unlimited access), a demo on a customized Ultra Video Gallery / Flash Media Server streaming video installation, an overview of DNN version 5, and much more.

Also, all members can receive a $200 discount to the upcoming Open Force / Dev Connections conference in Las Vegas in November! Please contact us for details and discount codes, or better yet, come to the meeting.
item.name: DNN Boston User Group
